```{r setup}
library(transx)
```

```{r eval=FALSE, include=FALSE}
fill_custom <- function(body, idx) {
  vec_len <- length(body) + length(idx)
  vec <- vector("numeric", vec_len)
  vec[-idx] <- body
  vec[idx] <- vec[idx-2]
  vec
}

```
